com.twitter.elephantbird.pig.util
Interface WritableConverter<W extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

Type Parameters:
W - the Writable type to and from which conversion/casting is supported.
All Superinterfaces:
org.apache.pig.LoadCaster, org.apache.pig.LoadStoreCaster, org.apache.pig.StoreCaster
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractWritableConverter, GenericWritableConverter, IntWritableConverter, TextConverter
public interface WritableConverter<W extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends org.apache.pig.LoadStoreCaster

Extends LoadStoreCaster to add initialization and schema validation routines useful when dealing with conversion between Pig and Writable types.

Author:
Andy Schlaikjer
See Also:
SequenceFileStorage

getLoadSchema

org.apache.pig.ResourceSchema.ResourceFieldSchema getLoadSchema()
                                                                throws java.io.IOException
Called during evaluation of Pig LOAD expressions, this method should return the expected Pig type of data loaded using this WritableConverter, or null if it can't be determined before reading data.

Returns:
Throws:
java.io.IOException

bytesToObject

java.lang.Object bytesToObject(org.apache.pig.data.DataByteArray dataByteArray)
                               throws java.io.IOException
Called during evaluation of Pig LOAD expressions, this method decodes Writable instance data from raw bytes and then converts the Writable to an appropriate Pig value. Implementations should override this method and delegate to an appropriate LoadCaster#bytesTo*() method.

Parameters:
dataByteArray - raw bytes which encode an instance of type W.
Returns:
Pig value.
Throws:
java.io.IOException
See Also:
LoadCaster.bytesToCharArray(byte[])

checkStoreSchema

void checkStoreSchema(org.apache.pig.ResourceSchema.ResourceFieldSchema schema)
                      throws java.io.IOException
Called during evaluation of Pig STORE expressions, this method validates the expression's schema. Implementations should throw an exception if conversion from the specified Pig type to W is unsupported.

Parameters:
schema -
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if conversion from the Pig type specified by schema is unsupported.

toWritable

W toWritable(java.lang.Object value)
                                                   throws java.io.IOException
Called during evaluation of Pig STORE expressions, this method converts Pig value to Writable value. Implementations should try and minimize creation of W instances by returning the same instance (updated to reflect value) from each call.

Parameters:
value - Pig object to convert.
Returns:
writable or a new W instance containing data from value.
Throws:
java.io.IOException
